Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Pn-Imn with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced features, a collar and crossed arms in relief with bracelets holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket and is marked with a hole.
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
